com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common

Class ModuleLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Logger
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.ModuleLogger

  • public class ModuleLogger
extends java.util.logging.Logger
    A logger that is meant to log a given module of the server, for example that of a Plugin

      • warnOnce

        public void warnOnce(java.lang.String message)
        Logs a simple warning message to the server console, but only does this upon the first invocation. This enables easier bugtracking to identify longstanding issues that need resolving. The place in the code where this is called is printed, along with the message.

        Prints with WARNING level.
        Parameters:
        message - to log

      • once

        public void once(java.util.logging.Level level,
                 java.lang.String message)
        Logs a simple warning message to the server console, but only does this upon the first invocation. This enables easier bugtracking to identify longstanding issues that need resolving. The place in the code where this is called is printed, along with the message.
        Parameters:
        level - of the message
        message - to log

      • once

        public void once(java.util.logging.Level level,
                 java.lang.String message,
                 java.lang.Throwable t)
        Logs a simple warning message with exception information to the server console, but only does this upon the first invocation. This enables easier bugtracking to identify longstanding issues that need resolving. The place in the code where this is called is printed, along with the message.
        Parameters:
        level - of the message
        message - to log
        t - throwable to log

        public void handleReflectionMissing(java.lang.String type,

                                    java.lang.Class<?> source)
        Handles the message and/or stack trace logging when something related to reflection is missing
        Parameters:
        type - of thing that is missing
        name - of the thing that is missing
        source - class in which it is missing
